Method Summary
 Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesClassifiedByAll(Set<URI> modelReferences)

Method Detail

findServicesConsumingAll

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesConsumingAll(Set<URI> inputTypes)
Discover registered services that consume all the types of input provided. That is, all those that have as input the types provided. All the input types should be matched to different inputs.

Parameters:
inputTypes - the types of input to be consumed
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesConsumingSome

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesConsumingSome(Set<URI> inputTypes)
Discover registered services that consume some (i.e., at least one) of the types of input provided. That is, all those that have as input the types provided.

Parameters:
inputTypes - the types of input to be consumed
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesProducingAll

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesProducingAll(Set<URI> outputTypes)
Discover registered services that produce all of the types of output provided. That is, all those that can be matched to the output types provided. Note, each output should be matched to a different type.

Parameters:
outputTypes - the types of output to be produced
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesProducingSome

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesProducingSome(Set<URI> outputTypes)
Discover registered services that produce some (i.e., at least one) of the types of output provided. That is, all those for which at least one output can be matched to the output types provided.

Parameters:
outputTypes - the types of output to be produced
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesClassifiedByAll

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesClassifiedByAll(Set<URI> modelReferences)
Discover the services that are classified by all the types given. That is, all those that have some level of matching with respect to all services provided in the model references.

Parameters:
modelReferences - the classifications to match against
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesClassifiedBySome

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesClassifiedBySome(Set<URI> modelReferences)
Discover the services that are classified by some (i.e., at least one) of the types given. That is, all those that have some level of matching with respect to at least one entity provided in the model references.

Parameters:
modelReferences - the classifications to match against
Returns:
a Set containing all the matching services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.

findServicesInvocableWith

Map<URI,MatchResult> findServicesInvocableWith(Set<URI> inputTypes)
Discover registered services that can be invoked based on the types of input provided. That is, all those that do not have any mandatory input that cannot be fulfilled with the provided ones.

Parameters:
inputTypes - the types of inputs provided
Returns:
a Set containing all the invocable services. If there are no solutions, the Set should be empty, not null.
